Posts.Content: I have been considering breast reconstruction which will have to be put off for a while but was wondering from people who have actually had the reconstruction done, what their stories are. Please help! I've read handouts, the internet, etc. and still can't decide! Any input or suggestions, pros and cons would be appreciated! Thanks Age 37 Diagnosed September, 2006 Not Menopausal Stage IIA Invasive Ductal Carcinoma Ductal Carcinoma In Situ, High Grade Estrogen Receptors 46% positive nuclei Her-2 Negative Bilateral Mastectomy Sentinal Node Biopsy Chemo & Hormone Therapy to Follow
Posts.Title: Breast Reconstruction

Posts.Content: I went yesterday to my first oncologist appointment and noticed that the closest person to my age (37) was in the least 15 years older than me and found this forum and wondered if there are people my age going through the same things that I am or not. Age 37 Diagnosed September, 2006 Not Menopausal Stage IIA Invasive Ductal Carcinoma Ductal Carcinoma In Situ, High Grade Estrogen Receptors 46% positive nuclei Her-2 Negative Bilateral Mastectomy Sentinal Node Biopsy Chemo & Hormone Therapy to Follow
Posts.Title: How many out there are around my age?
